sentences.sContent: They have received notice of a typhoon approaching.
sentences.sContent_eng: They have received notice of a typhoon approaching.
sentences.sCn: 他们已收到台风即将来临的预报。

sentences.sContent: We both are under stress and standing in the middle of a typhoon .
sentences.sContent_eng: We both are under stress and standing in the middle of a typhoon .
sentences.sCn: 你我都处在很紧张的环境中，站在台风的中心。

sentences.sContent: The football match have to stand over next week for the typhoon storm.
sentences.sContent_eng: The football match have to stand over next week for the typhoon storm.
sentences.sCn: 由于台风风暴，这场足球赛延期到下个星期举行。
